attributes.action: reinstate the facility to email the Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For some unknown reason the ability to email the Prime Minister has been termintated, in a modern society this is unacceptable.

rejection.details:
We are looking at the E-mail Number 10 service to ensure that it meets the same high standards as the other content and communication measures that the website delivers. 

We aim to have it up and running as soon as possible. Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience caused.

In the meantime, there are other means of communicating with the PM:
http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
http://www.number10.gov.uk/communicate/ask-the-pm
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
